Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1BDET WHERE FORMATOD1BCODI = :FORMATOD1BCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY FORMATOD1BDETCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1BDET ( FORMATOD1BDETCODI, FORMATOD1BCODI, ANIO, MES, DEMANDAENERGIA, DEMANDAHP, DEMANDAHFP, GENERACIONENERGIA, GENERACIONHP, GENERACIONHFP, DEMANDANETAHP, DEMANDANETAHFP, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1BDETCODI, :FORMATOD1BCODI, :ANIO, :MES, :DEMANDAENERGIA, :DEMANDAHP, :DEMANDAHFP, :GENERACIONENERGIA, :GENERACIONHP, :GENERACIONHFP, :DEMANDANETAHP, :DEMANDANETAHFP, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1BDET SET FORMATOD1BCODI = :FORMATOD1BCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, MES = :MES, DEMANDAENERGIA = :DEMANDAENERGIA, DEMANDAHP = :DEMANDAHP, DEMANDAHFP = :DEMANDAHFP, GENERACIONENERGIA = :GENERACIONENERGIA, GENERACIONHP = :GENERACIONHP, GENERACIONHFP = :GENERACIONHFP, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1BDETCODI = :FORMATOD1BDETCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1BDET ORDER BY FORMATOD1BDETCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1BDET SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1BCODI IN (SELECT FORMATOD1BCODI FROM CAM_FORMATOD1B WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0' ) AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1BDET WHERE FORMATOD1BDETCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
